briefdescription.para: Pushes a scene on the stack.
Pops a scene from the stack.

simplesect.para: The top scene from the stack, nullptr if the stack is empty.

briefdescription.para: Compiles a shader module to the necessary shader language.
Creates a logical device bound to a physical GPU.

memberdef.argsstring: (float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float zNear, float zFar) const
memberdef.name: getFrustum

parameterdescription.para: The left and right planes position.
The top and bottom planes position.
The near and far planes position.

memberdef.argsstring: (castor::Angle const &fovy, float aspect, float zNear, float zFar) const
memberdef.name: getPerspective

detaileddescription.para:
Computes a perspective projection matrix.
fovy
The vertical aperture angle.
aspect
The width / height ratio.
zNear
The near plane position.
zFar
The far plane position.

memberdef.name: getInfinitePerspective

detaileddescription.para:
Computes a perspective projection matrix with no far plane clipping.
radiansFovY
The vertical aperture angle.
aspect
The width / height ratio.
zNear
The near plane position.

briefdescription.para: Adds the instance layers names to the given names.
